title: Fichu, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Embroidery using cotton in chain stitch made with a tambour hook and areas of deflected element wotk on cotton plain weave.
description: Square with an embroidered border on all four sides. But the embroidery is done with two borders righting on one side and two borders righting on the other so that the square could be folded and used as a fichu.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fichu, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Embroidery using cotton in chain stitch made with a tambour hook and areas of deflected element wotk on cotton plain weave.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-338.
